Package polimi.ingsw.controller

package polimi.ingsw.controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    polimi.ingsw
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameController
    GameController Class
    Controls a specific Game GameModel by allowing a player to perform all actions that can be executed in a game The class can add, remove, reconnect and disconnects players to the game and let players grab and position tiles from the playground to the shelf.
    GameControllerTest
     
    GameTest
     
    MainController
    MainController Class
    Is the Controller of the controllers, it manages all the available games that are running GameController
    Allowing players to create, join, reconnect, leave and delete games
    Therefore, the MainController is unique across the app and thus implements the Singleton Pattern
